page.title: 03AT LEISURE
page.content: If a girl is seven she might join Brownies.The nearest pack is in Bourne.Two girls are Guides and two are joining in September.At eight boys might join Cubs and go on to Scouts later.Five are Cubs and one is a Scout.One boy and one girl are members of the Pony club.At the Village Hall there is a Snooker club.Steam Action is a club for adults.They organise events to raise money for charity to help the old people in the village. These events include:dancing,barbecues,bingo sessions.jumble sales,whist drives and gymkhanas.The ladies have a Womens Fellowship every month.The farmers have a Farmers' discussion group usually held at the Five Bells.
